text:
@joncoopertweets @fred_guttenberg You can count on it.  

Only time in history you could show up with bioweapon and hurt everyone and get off scott free. And NOT just because not knowing is a defense.  There is no law in place right now that protects the public from a person with Covid-19 going anywhere.
